text: Peter Kelly (4 September 1886 – 1949) was a professional footballer who played as a full-back for Sunderland. ==References== Category:1886 births Category:1949 deaths Category:People from Magherafelt Category:Association footballers from Northern Ireland Category:Association football fullbacks Category:North Shields F.C. players Category:Sunderland A.F.C. players Category:Merthyr Town F.C. players Category:English Football League players
title: Peter Kelly (footballer)
